name: Gigaom Roles
author: Gigaom

sections.description:
This plugin provides a framework for allowing filterable definition of your own roles.
This will require code to be written in order for this plugin to show any new functionality.

Links

  • WordPress plugin page
  • GitHub repo

Contributing

This plugin is developed and available on GitHub. Contributions and questions are welcome!
sections.installation:
1. Upload go-roles to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate ‘Gigaom Roles’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add custom filters to your theme or plugins

short_description: Utility plugin to allow filterable definition of custom roles and their capabilities.
